django.contrib.gis.geos.collections
===================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.geos.collections

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module houses the Geometry Collection objects:
   GeometryCollection, MultiPoint, MultiLineString, and MultiPolygon



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.geos.collections.GeometryCollection
   django.contrib.gis.geos.collections.MultiPoint
   django.contrib.gis.geos.collections.MultiLineString
   django.contrib.gis.geos.collections.MultiPolygon


Module Contents
---------------

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.geos.geometry.GEOSGeometry`


   .. py:property:: kml

      Return the KML for this Geometry Collection.


   .. py:property:: tuple

      Return a tuple of all the coordinates in this Geometry Collection


   .. py:attribute:: coords
